value.title: Write if statements like a Pro in Power Query
value.excerpt: As the title says, in this video I will show you how to write if-statements like a pro: 00:00 The ultimate if-statement 00:40 if statement in Excel wont work 01:50 Use power query user interface to write if statement 03:00 Nested if-statements 03:38 AND/OR conditions in if statements 04:48 NOT condition

value.title: 3 REASONS to use a single dataset for your Power BI reports

Christopher Wagner Article: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/dataflows-datasets-power-bi-christopher-wagner-mba/  ExceleratorBI article: https://exceleratorbi.com.au/new-power-bi-reports-golden-dataset/

value.title: Avoid the full refresh with Incremental Refresh in Power BI (Premium)

Handling deletes within Incremental Refresh in Power BI: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nKVrl0ec6uE

value.excerpt: How can you find, collect, and clean data from different sources? Power BI is a tool for making sense of your data. You will learn tricks to make data-gathering easier.
